<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Adaptive Ablation](/Spells.aspx?ID=2378)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 262

**Domain**
[Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=102)

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** You take [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=524), [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555), [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=586), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604), or [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=697) damage.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You shift yourself to adapt to the mystical wavelengths of the energy damage, protecting yourself from further harm. You gain [resistance](/Rules.aspx?ID=2312) 5 to the triggering energy type; you gain this resistance after you take the triggering damage, so it applies only to future damage you take during the duration. 

---
**Heightened (+2)** The resistance increases by 5.
name: Adaptive Ablation
